title: Reading and hearing Surah Yasin in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Surah Yasin in a dream is one of the surahs called the heart of the Holy Qur’an, and when the dreamer sees in his dream that he is repeating this surah, he wakes up very pleased and hastens to learn its interpretation. Regarding what he wants, interpretations differ from one person to another, and in this article we look together at the most important things that scholars have said. Surah Yasin in a dream. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin confirms that seeing the dreamer of Surah Yasin in his dream or reading it heralds abundant goodness and many benefits that he can enjoy and achieve many goals and ambitions. Which he always aspires to. And if the dreamer sees that she is reading Surat Yassin in her dream, this means that she is immune from all evil and from the provocations and slips of Satan. Imam Nabulsi, may God have mercy on him, also sees that Surat Yassin in a dream while you read it is one of the praiseworthy visions and heralds the dreamer’s resurrection with the Prophet Muhammad. Peace be upon him. On the Day of Resurrection. When the dreamer sees that he is constantly reading Surat Yasin in a dream, this brings him good news about the death of anxiety and relief, and the doors of happiness will open before him and he will obtain a lot of goodness in his life. Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Surat Yasin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that reading Surat Yasin in a dream indicates the dreamer’s honesty and sincerity towards all people, the good intentions with which he deals, and the fairness of his circumstances. And in the event that she sees A married dreamer sees that she reads Surat Yassin in her dream, this means that she has a good reputation and performs many good deeds and acts of worship and is always close to God. When the dreamer sees that he reads Surat Yassin from the Holy Qur’an, this symbolizes a good situation, earning a lot of money and perseverance in achieving Many things please God and His Messenger. And if the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Yasin before he sleeps, this means that he is protecting himself from the incitement of Satan and is under the protection of God and the blessing of his life. And when an unmarried girl sees that she is memorizing Surat Yasin for young children, she will find a prestigious job and advance in it thanks to Her great effort, or being blessed with a good husband. The dreamer, if he sees Surah Yasin in his sleep and reads it in a dream, this means that he lives in days filled with calm and tranquility and his ability to overcome all his worries and problems in his life. The prominent researcher Ibn Sirin claims that seeing someone reading the image of Yasin For the pregnant woman, it leads to her immunity and health, and her birth will be easy and without stress. Surah Yasin in a dream by Al-Osaimi. The great scholar Al-Osaimi believes that Surah Yasin in a dream shows the kind and kind heart that the dreamer has, and that he always likes to do good deeds for the sake of God’s satisfaction. And in the event that you see the dreamer reciting Surah Yasin in a dream, this indicates his love for the Messenger of God, Muhammad, and his devotion to him in words and deeds. Al-Usaimi says that when the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Yasin in a dream, this means that he is righteous, and will be blessed with a great position in his Lord in the afterlife. Surah Yasin in a dream for a woman

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing rabbits and rabbits in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a rabbit and rabbits in a dream in detail according to dream scholars. The rabbit has a number of features that distinguished its body and differed from others, and its bright white color, which resembles pure white cotton, is one of the most beautiful features of the rabbit. In addition to that, a number of other colors and multiple features were found. Scientists have mentioned it in interpretation, and during this article we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing a rabbit and rabbits in a dream in detail.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a rabbit and rabbits in a dream, as seeing this animal in a dream has many meanings and meanings that are considered good and good most of the time, because they differ from one viewer to another, Along these lines, we will explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a rabbit and rabbits in a dream. It is also: According to what Ibn Sirin explained, the dream of rabbits in a dream is a symbol of a woman. The characteristics and qualities of this woman are linked to the details that the fortuneteller sees in the dream of this rabbit. If the fortuneteller is a merchant and tends to Business. Seeing a rabbit in a dream is a sign of abundant profit, an increase in the scope of business and expansion of projects. In addition, if the fortuneteller is married. Seeing a rabbit in a dream is a symbol of young children, a lot of play and some kind of positive energy in the house. As much as possible, Over time, it turns into negative energy that reflects negatively on everyone. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of seeing tonsillectomy in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a rabbit in a dream for a single woman, as seeing a rabbit in a dream for a single girl has many connotations and good interpretations, and during this paragraph we will explain the interpretation of the vision. A rabbit in a dream for a single woman is also: If an unmarried girl sees a white rabbit in a dream. This vision is evidence of her marriage to a man of good morals and good behavior among people. In addition, if a single girl sees a brown rabbit in a dream. This vision is evidence of a marriage. The dreamer will be relieved of worries, the disappearance of her sadness, and the stability of her soul. Also, if an unmarried woman sees a black rabbit in a dream. This vision indicates that the dreamer will achieve everything he aspires to and dreams of. It should be noted that seeing a rabbit in general in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she You will marry an introvert who loves isolation. Likewise, seeing a brown rabbit in a dream for a single girl. It is evidence of a happy marriage and stability that the wife will witness in the future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my husband’s car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a white rabbit for a married woman. The interpretations of the dreams that we see differ. It contains a rabbit depending on the color of the rabbit and the social status of the viewer, and along these lines we will explain the interpretation of a dream of a white rabbit for a married woman. It is also: If a married woman sees in a dream a rabbit, which is white in color. This vision is evidence of blessings and many good things because it indicates overcoming problems and crises. It also This vision is an indication of the pregnancy of a married woman with memory, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing parsley in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a white rabbit for a divorced woman.

title: Interpretation of bankruptcy in a dream: seeing lack of money in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The dream of bankruptcy in the dream of a single, married, or pregnant girl and the meaning of spending all the money on purchases. Bankruptcy in a dream: Bankruptcy is evidence of the bad condition of the bankrupt person in his religion or in his world, and that bankruptcy is taken from the money, which is the lowest amount of money, and if the bankrupt person falls ill in a dream, it indicates his death and exhaustion. From his livelihood, or moving from his profession to something below it. It often indicates spiritual or emotional bankruptcy and indicates a person’s need to feel loved or successful and determined, so bankruptcy does not necessarily indicate material matters. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is bankrupt and is sick in reality, This is a sign of his poor condition and the need for immediate treatment, and perhaps a sign of death. One of the most important things that a dream of bankruptcy indicates for the dreamer is moving from one job to another or from one job to another. Among the meanings that a dream of bankruptcy carries in relation to the real events that occur For the dreamer, it is a sign of loss in social life or high grades achieved in professional life and may indicate loss of profession. Among the meanings that are indicated when seeing bankruptcy in a dream are the issues and problems that the dreamer faces in real life, and bankruptcy can indicate his inability to acquire new fields and opportunities, which will cause him problems and loss later. Seeing bankruptcy in a dream and the dream indicates the situation in which he lives. In which the dreamer sees either the state with regard to matters of his faith or those related to the affairs of his life and his worldly affairs. Whoever sees in his dream that he is broken down while he is sick, his vision indicates the end of his term and his imminent death, or the dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to some changes that force him to leave his job for another, lesser one. Work from it. It has been mentioned in some interpretations of some contemporary interpreters that whoever sees in a dream that he has gone bankrupt, his vision shows the difficulty, turmoil and exhaustion that the dreamer faces. And whoever sees in his dream that people have gone bankrupt, the dream indicates that the dreamer will mix with sincere people. And personal owners in the transactions he carries out. Whoever sees in a dream that some of those close to him are suffering from bankruptcy, this is evidence that he will be exposed to harm or problems due to his dealings with some people with a bad reputation and illegal actions. If you dream that you are broke, then you should not resort to these The means to fit in with the world, because your strength and pride will live to do your job well. But you may find yourself in trouble. If you dream that others are broken, then you will meet men who are honest in your dealings, but they may harm you honestly. For a girl, this means that her lover will be honest and frank, but an annoying conflict may break out in her professional life. It indicates a partial collapse in work and a weakening of brain capabilities. It is a warning to leave commercial speculation alone. Bankruptcy: Evidence of the inferiority of the bankrupt person in his religious or worldly affairs, and if he is sick, it is evidence of the exhaustion of his livelihood or his death. Interpretation of a dream about bankruptcy - YouTube

title: I dreamed that I was traveling to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was traveling. Traveling outside the country in which you live is one of the hopes that people always aspire to, and there are many reasons that people aspire to, either to work and earn a lot of money to meet needs and improve income, or to go out and enjoy luxury, and when the dreamer sees that he is traveling, he is in a hurry. To know the interpretation of the vision, is it good or bad for her? Here we learn together the most important things the interpreters said. I dreamed that I was traveling. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is preparing to travel, this means that she will enter a new life, and there will be a lot of charity. If the dreamer sees that she is traveling in a dream, this means that she is thinking about her past life and is not looking forward to To her present future and she suffers from heartache, and this is a result of her subconscious taking out her mind. . Than it is. Also, if a girl sees that she is traveling in a dream, this means that she is looking forward to the best and trying to fulfill her desires. And when a girl sees that she has traveled to a foreign country and is walking through its streets, this symbolizes that she will be in contact with a generous person who will achieve everything she wants. If the dreamer who is studying is traveling in an airplane, this means that God will grant her great excellence and success at all academic levels. Seeing the trip also promises the only dreamer that the doors of livelihood will open before her and she will obtain many things that she is looking forward to. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in Interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that I was traveling to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the vision of travel and the dreamer’s preparation for it indicates that he is actually doing it and truly loves it, and this is from the attachment of the subconscious mind If a girl sees that she is traveling abroad, this means that her financial and social conditions will improve. Also, if the dreamer sees that she is traveling and is suffering from sadness and the accumulation of things in her head, this means that she will be happy during that period and everything that is bothering her will be removed. When a girl sees that she is traveling, this means that she She looks forward to her upcoming future, and works hard to achieve what she wants. If the dreamer sees that he is traveling, this means that he always aspires for the best and wants to achieve many ambitions. But if the girl is depressed and sees that she is traveling, this portends the death of everything that bothers her and brings her comfort. She dreamed I am traveling singles. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is traveling and carrying a bag means that she will get married soon. If a girl sees that she is traveling to a far away country, this means that one of her acquaintances wants to get close to her or propose to her. If an unmarried woman sees that she is traveling by express train, This symbolizes that she will make many positive changes in her life and the doors of goodness will open for her. If the dreamer sees that he is traveling by plane, this means that he will be in a good situation, and will draw closer to God and do many good deeds to obtain forgiveness and pardon. The girl who works and sees that she is traveling By car means that she will get...

Interpretation of a dream about my sister who kills herself in a dream could lead to a stronger relationship with her, and God knows best. You both know that seeing a sister killing herself in a dream may represent the sister’s need to Help, and God knows all that is not seen. title: Interpretation of the name Nourhan in a dream

preview.html: Nourhan is a feminine scientific name composed of the Arabic words “Nour” and “Han”: king, prince, in Mongolian Turkish, and it is called a masculine and feminine name. Its origin is “Khan” and the Ottomans say it “hahahaha” and say: Nourhan. Its meaning: the bright queen, or the light of the king. It can be abbreviated, and they say: Nouran. In terms of dream interpretation, the name Nourhan is classified under “angelic” names, which means that it is one of the reassuring names that generate optimism and joy. The origin of this is that the name comes from light and light in dream interpretation, which means (the apparent truth) in addition to the word (Han) which means king, and thus the name Nourhan becomes one of the names of Nourhan. Nobility, honor and glory, especially when hearing, pronouncing or writing it. It is also good for the sleeper to see in his sleep a very beautiful girl named Nourhan, then interpret the dream as clear news about the sun. The good thing is that Nourhan smiles and acts kindly and lovingly with the fortune teller. In short, the name Nourhan is one of the most praised names and the same in interpretation: Noor, Noor Al-Huda, Shams, Noor, and Ishraq. It is also said that the name is praiseworthy because it contains energy derived from the words (light) and (king) and the name has a musical rhythm that gives a sense of psychological reassurance. Interpretation of a dream about the name Nourhan in a dream Hearing the name Nourhan in a person's dream is generally considered good because the name comes from light and light in a dream is the truth or good news or enlightenment. As well as seeing this name written or engraved. As for seeing a character named Nourhan in a dream, this is also good news, especially if Nourhan is the single woman's friend, colleague, or neighbor. For this interpretation to be correct, Nourhan is required to look cheerful, laugh and smile and wear a beautiful dress. If a single woman gets something good, she will see it soon. And if she shakes hands with her, the unmarried woman meets good luck. If she accepts it, she is accepted in a matter that the single woman seeks to achieve. The appearance of a girl or woman named Nourhan in the dream of an unmarried woman can be great news if she sees the unmarried Nourhan getting married or sees her marriage without a celebration. The marriage of a friend or neighbor may indicate the marriage of the dreamer. Narrated by Ibn Sirin: What the sleeper sees from his partner in a dream is true for him if there is a true and sincere friendship between them. It was also mentioned in some interpretations that the name Nourhan is one of the names loaded with energy and therefore it is a source of optimism for whoever sees it. It was said that the name has an angelic connotation, meaning that what you say about Nourhan in a dream may be true. And he did not hate seeing the character Nourhan working at all. The meaning of the name Nourhan in a dream for a married woman The name Nourhan in a married woman's dream indicates absolute goodness. This goodness is often associated with many aspects of life, such as livelihood, health, etc. It is commendable in the interpretation for a married woman to see a beautiful girl named Nourhan entering her house, and the meaning of this dream is that goodness enters him, grace descends upon him, and good news overwhelms him. The name Nourhan in this context calls for optimism.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the police according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the police: The police and their men are very important elements in society because they maintain security and stability and prevent any transgression or crimes by outlaws and deal with them immediately, but seeing the police and officers in a dream also has a good meaning or not; We will learn this in detail in the following lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream about the police: The police in a dream. The jurists give it many interpretations, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: Imam Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on him - explained that dreaming of the police leads to a feeling of safety and the ability to deal with Bad and wrong actions that cause stress and suffering to people. Seeing the police in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s good planning for all aspects of his life and he is always ready to deal with anything that may come his way, making him capable of dealing with any crisis that he may face. In the event that the dreamer A student and a witness in the police, this indicates his excellence in his studies and his ability to reach the highest ranks. If a person quarrels with someone and sees the police in his dream, this is a sign that the differences between them have ended and the relationship has returned to what it was before. Enter a site about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about police by Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Ibn Shirin mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about a policeman the following: Seeing policemen in a dream means a feeling of peace and security and provides the dreamer with a peaceful life free of fear and anxiety. If someone dreams of police, this A sign that he is a person who can achieve his dreams and goals easily and without causing any problems. Whoever dreams of the police entering his home indicates the many blessings they enjoy in their lives and their great sense of psychological comfort. The dream also symbolizes the death of things that disturb his life and his ability to achieve his goals. When he dreams If someone sees that the police are calling his name, the dream proves that his life will change for the better, and if they run after him or around him very quickly, it means that he has committed sins and is far from the Lord. - Almighty - and the necessity of repentance. Interpretation of a dream about the police for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees the police in her dream and is afraid, this is a sign that in reality she is afraid of them and the anxiety she feels when looking at the police. The police in a girl’s dream symbolizes the great responsibilities that fall on her shoulders. And on her difficult life, in addition to her fear of the future and what might happen in it. But if she is naturally not afraid to see the police and feels safe in their presence, then the dream of the police indicates a sense of peace and tranquility and she must now begin to achieve her dreams. A dream about the police for single people may indicate the problem The big one she is currently facing in her life, which she can only solve with the help of others. Interpretation of a police dream for a married woman When a woman dreams that the police arrested her children, this is a sign of their kindness and gentle morals and the presence of someone in her life who conspires against them and wants to harm them. If a married woman sees the police in her A dream, this will lead

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing kunafa in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Kunafa in a dream, because Kunafa is a type of popular sweets that is often used in the month of Ramadan. But what does it mean to see a ferret in a dream? Many people see rodents in their dreams and do not know what the interpretation of this dream is. Seeing a ferret in a dream indicates achieving happiness and pleasure. It indicates the fulfillment of desires, success and distinction, and we wish you success.. Kunafa in a dream. To the next, follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing kunafa by Ibn Sirin. Through the following points we will tell you the interpretation of the dream of seeing kunafa by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing kunafa in a dream is a symbol of intelligence. Seeing yourself eating a mongoose It is a sign of good news and a happy life. Seeing sweets in general indicates abundant living and an increase in money. Seeing kunafa in a dream indicates stability, whether in the psychological or emotional state. It also indicates knowledge and sciences. Interpretation of a dream about seeing kunafa for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream is evidence of her marriage. The dream also indicates the disappearance of her fears and sorrows. Likewise, seeing a single mother in a dream is evidence of entering into a romantic relationship. Interpretation of a dream about seeing kunafa for a married woman: seeing a woman A married woman eating kunafa in a dream means that she is living a stable life. Kunafa in a married woman’s dream indicates love and tenderness with her husband and reconciliation. Seeing kunafa in a married woman’s dreams indicates the death of her fears and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing kunafa for a man. We will tell you through the points below the interpretation of a dream about seeing kunafa. For a man. Seeing a kunafa in a dream is evidence of savings and good news. Seeing a man fasting and breaking his fast with fenugreek indicates that he will marry a beautiful woman. Seeing a man who owes a dowry in a dream indicates paying his debt. If you see a man kunafa in a dream, this means that you will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Kunafa for a pregnant woman: Seeing Kunafa in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an easy birth. Seeing a pregnant woman eating Kunafa in her dream indicates the birth of a child, if the Kunafa is very delicious. Seeing buying Kunafa in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good health and ease in childbirth. The gift of Kunafa in a dream is a vision A gift from a ferret in a dream has many connotations that indicate many good things. Hearing good news means a safe and stable life. Also, seeing a student buying kunafa is evidence of his success and distinction in his studies. Eating raw kunafa in a dream. Seeing a marten eating in a dream means a lot. Of abundant sustenance and goodness for the pioneer. It also indicates success and success in practical life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing kunafa with cream for a single woman. Seeing kunafa with cream is one of the good visions that indicate good morals religiously and emotionally. Kunafa with cream for single people, as it indicates overcoming adversity and crises, happiness and joy after sadness and pain. Interpretation Dreaming of eating basbousa and kefir. Seeing sweets in a dream generally indicates a lot of good for the dreamer. And in happy news and occasions. Seeing a ferret with basbousa indicates achieving goals and satisfying desires. In the end
